channel.title: Help, PK POINTS! Please just read and see if you can help!
channel.description:
Hello everybody, thanks for taking the time to read this. Now my problem is with PkPoints (as the topic says). I would like to know how to add them? People are requesting I add them. I'm on a PwnScape base (Delta) and I really need some help.
And also if anyone could help me with making a shop for PKpoints (i'd put statius, vesta and etc.) that'd be cool.
Thanks, Fox0wnage.

item.title: Help, PK POINTS! Please just read and see if you can help!
item.dc:creator: @bq_blackjack bq blackjack
item.description:
@bq_blackjack wrote:

first add this
public int PkPoints;

anywhere in client.java, the do control+f and search killerz

then add this after the last killerz.something

killerz.PkPoints += 2; 2 is how many pk points are added.

EXAMPLE:
if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && playerRights != 4 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 1500) {
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
youdied();
killerz.sM(“You have defeated “+playerName+”.”);
killerz.pkPoints += 2;
updateRequired = true;
followingh = false;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

i’m still working on pkpoints shop…its pissing me off…im still a newbie coder

Read full topic
item.source: Help, PK POINTS! Please just read and see if you can help!
